```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r load-packages, echo = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(broom)
library(patchwork)
library(yardstick)
library(labelled)
```

```{r}
library(haven)
Wave1_data <- read_sav("Wave1_20170906.sav")
```

```{r}
data <- Wave1_data %>%
  mutate(country = as.factor(country)) %>%
  mutate(religion = as.factor(se006))

levels(data$country) <- c("Japan", "Hong Kong", "Taiwan", "Korea", "Thailand",
                          "Philippines", "China", "Indonesia")
levels(data$religion) <- c("Roman Catholic", "Protestant", "Jews", "Islam",
                           "Hindu", "Buddhist", "Other", "Iglesia Ni Cristo",
                           "Aglipayan", "Born Again", "None")
```


```{r}
data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = country, fill = religion)) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill")
```

```{r}
religions <- Wave1_data %>%
  select(country, se006) %>%
  group_by(country, se006) %>%
  count()
```
